name: Jackfruit Noodles 400g
description: Savory noodles made with jackfruit extract for a unique Sri Lankan twist.
usage: Boil for 4-6 minutes and serve with your favorite curry or sauce.

name: Durian Syrup 250ml
description: Concentrated durian syrup perfect for drinks, desserts and marinades.
usage: Mix 1 part syrup to 6 parts water or use as a topping for desserts.

name: Wood Apple Cordial 500ml
description: A tangy cordial made from ripe wood apples, ideal for refreshing drinks.
usage: Dilute with water or soda for a refreshing beverage.

name: Banana Chips 200g
description: Crispy, lightly salted banana chips made from local varieties.
usage: Ready to eat as a snack or with dips.
